opt_setting_msg.message:
Settings infomation to login to TokyoTech Portal.
However Account information and Matrix Code are stored in Local Storage, Please take responsibility for your actions.

opt_save_account_failed.message: Saving failed. Please check whether you fill in necessary items.

opt_confirm_clear_account_pswd.message: Do you really want to delete?

opt_save_matrix_failed.message: Saving failed. Please check whether you fill in necessary items.

opt_confirm_clear_matrix.message: Do you really want to delete?

pop_usage_msg_1.message: You can initialize in Option Page.

pop_usage_msg_2.message: Please make sure that Auto Login is enabled.

pop_usage_msg_4.message: Save the matrix code behind the student ID card.

pop_usage_msg_5.message: Go to the login page of the Portal, and you can login automatically.

con_setting_account_msg.message: Set account and password to enable Auto Login.

con_setting_matrix_msg.message: Set Matrix Code to enable Auto Login.
